verses.verse: Do not <S%G1969>sharply<s%> <S%G1969>rebuke<s%> an <S%G4245>older<s%> <S%G4245>man,<s%> but [rather] <S%G3870>appeal<s%> to [him] as a <S%G3962>father,<s%> [to] the <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G3501>men<s%> as <S%G80>brothers,<s%>
the <S%G4245>older<s%> <S%G4245>women<s%> as <S%G3384>mothers,<s%> [and] the <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G3501>women<s%> as <S%G79>sisters,<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G47>purity.<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> who are <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G3689>indeed;<s%>

but <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1549>grandchildren,<s%> let them <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> to <S%G2151>practice<s%> <S%G2151>piety<s%> in regard to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>family,<s%> and to <S%G591>make<s%> some <S%G591>return<s%> to their <S%G4269>parents;<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G587>acceptable<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> she who is a <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G3689>indeed,<s%> and who has been <S%G3443>left<s%> <S%G3443>alone<s%> has <S%G1679>fixed<s%> her <S%G1679>hope<s%> on <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4357>continues<s%> in <S%G1162>entreaties<s%> and <S%G4335>prayers<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day.<s%>
But she who <S%G4684>gives<s%> <S%G4684>herself<s%> to <S%G4684>wanton<s%> <S%G4684>pleasure<s%> is <S%G2348>dead<s%> even while she <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
<S%G3853>Prescribe<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> as <S%G2532>well,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may be <S%G423>above<s%> <S%G423>reproach.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> does not <S%G4306>provide<s%> for his <S%G2398>own,<s%> and <S%G3122>especially<s%> for those of his <S%G3609>household,<s%> he has <S%G720>denied<s%> the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and is <S%G5501>worse<s%> than an <S%G571>unbeliever.<s%>

Let a <S%G5503>widow<s%> be <S%G2639>put<s%> on the <S%G2639>list<s%> only if she is not <S%G1640>less<s%> than <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> old, [having been] the <S%G1135>wife<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%>

<S%G3140>having<s%> a <S%G3140>reputation<s%> for <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works;<s%> [and] <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G5044>brought<s%> up <S%G5044>children,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G3580>shown<s%> <S%G3580>hospitality<s%> to <S%G3580>strangers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G3538>washed<s%> the saints' <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G1884>assisted<s%> those in <S%G2346>distress,<s%> [and] <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G1872>devoted<s%> <S%G1872>herself<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

But <S%G3868>refuse<s%> [to put] <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> [on the list], for <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2691>feel<s%> <S%G2691>sensual<s%> <S%G2691>desires<s%> in <S%G2691>disregard<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> they <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G1060>get<s%> <S%G1060>married,<s%>
[thus] <S%G2192>incurring<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G114>set<s%> <S%G114>aside<s%> their <S%G4413>previous<s%> <S%G4102>pledge.<s%>

And at the <S%G260>same<s%> <S%G260>time<s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> [to be] <S%G692>idle,<s%> as they <S%G4022>go<s%> <S%G4022>around<s%> from <S%G3614>house<s%> to <S%G3614>house;<s%> and not <S%G3441>merely<s%> <S%G692>idle,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5397>gossips<s%> and <S%G4021>busybodies,<s%> <S%G2980>talking<s%> about <S%G7506>things<s%> not <S%G7506>proper<s%> [to mention.]

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> I <S%G1014>want<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%> [widows] to <S%G1060>get<s%> <S%G1060>married,<s%> <S%G5041>bear<s%> <S%G5041>children,<s%> <S%G3616>keep<s%> <S%G3616>house,<s%> [and] <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G480>enemy<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> for <S%G3059>reproach;<s%>
for <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1624>turned<s%> <S%G1624>aside<s%> to <S%G3694>follow<s%> <S%G4567>Satan.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>woman<s%> who is a <S%G4103>believer<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> [dependent] <S%G5503>widows,<s%> let her <S%G1884>assist<s%> them, and let not the <S%G1577>church<s%> be <S%G916>burdened,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that it may <S%G1884>assist<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

Let the <S%G4245>elders<s%> who <S%G4291>rule<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> be <S%G515>considered<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G1362>double<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2872>work<s%> <S%G2872>hard<s%> at <S%G3056>preaching<s%> and <S%G1319>teaching.<s%>

For the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "You shall not <S%G5392>muzzle<s%> the <S%G1016>ox<s%> while he is <S%G248>threshing,<s%>" and "The <S%G2040>laborer<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> of his <S%G3408>wages.<s%>"

Do not <S%G3858>receive<s%> an <S%G2724>accusation<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> an <S%G4245>elder<s%> <S%G1622>except<s%> <S%G1508><s%> on the <S%G1909>basis<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

<S%G3588>Those<s%> who continue in <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G1651>rebuke<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G5401>fearful<s%> [of sinning.]

I <S%G1263>solemnly<s%> <S%G1263>charge<s%> you in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and of [His] <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> to <S%G5442>maintain<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> [principles] <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G4299>bias,<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> in a [spirit of] <S%G4346>partiality.<s%>

Do not <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon <S%G3367>anyone<s%> [too] <S%G5030>hastily<s%> and <S%G3366>thus<s%> <S%G2841>share<s%> [responsibility for] the <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G245>others;<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G53>free<s%> from <S%G53>sin.<s%>

<S%G3371>No<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G5202>drink<s%> <S%G5202>water<s%> [exclusively,] but <S%G5530>use<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of your <S%G4751>stomach<s%> and your <S%G4437>frequent<s%> <S%G769>ailments.<s%>

The <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> are <S%G4271>quite<s%> <S%G4271>evident,<s%> <S%G4254>going<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> them to <S%G2920>judgment;<s%> for <S%G5100>others,<s%> their [sins] <S%G1872>follow<s%> <S%G1872>after.<s%>

<S%G5615>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> that are <S%G2570>good<s%> are <S%G4271>quite<s%> <S%G4271>evident,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> which are <S%G247>otherwise<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2928>concealed.<s%>
